means: 使人怜悯的，可怜的，可鄙的

sentence.Network_en: Her grandmother seemed to her a pitiable figure.
sentence.Network_cn: 祖母在她看来是个可怜的人。

sentence.Network_en: The refugees were in a pitiable state.
Their bodies and clothes were in a pitiable condition.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的体貌和衣着极其可怜.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 全国医学博士英语统一考试单词2 - 豆丁网 ... pitch n． 沥青 pitiable a． 引人怜悯的；可怜的 pitiful a． 令人怜悯的；可怜的.
百度词典搜索_可 ... 可口可乐[ Coca-Cola] 可怜巴巴[ pitiable;very pitiful] 可怜虫[ poor fellow;poor devil;wretch].
可怜_互动百科 ... 【it's a pity】 可惜 【pitiful;pitiable】 值得怜悯 【meagre;miserable】 数量少或质量坏得不值一提.
可多音字_百度知道 ... 32. 可可儿的[ no sooner… than…] [pitiable;very pitiful] 非常令人可怜的样子.

list.abs: The most pitiable character trait of life si self - inferiority ., 人生最可怜的性情是自卑.
In his nakedness he was a pitiable figure ., 当他赤身裸体以后 , 他就成了个可怜的凡人.
a person regarded as pitiable or contemptible ., 被认为可怜或可鄙的人.
Owen was listening to this pitiable farrago with feelings of contempt and wonder ., 欧文带着轻蔑而又好奇的心情听着这一派胡言.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French piteable, from piteer 'to pity'

entry.tran: 值得怜悯（或同情）的；可怜的
entry.def: Someone who is pitiable is in such a sad or weak state that you feel pity for them.

example.ex: Her grandmother seemed to her a pitiable figure.
example.tran: 祖母在她看来是个可怜的人。

sentences.sentence: "the shabby room struck her as extraordinarily pathetic"- Galsworthy

auth_sentence.content: A pitiable portrait of an ailing little boy.
auth_sentence.res_content: A pitiable portrait of an ailing little boy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A pitiable portrait of an ailing little boy.

auth_sentence.content: Ignorance is humorous, but at times it just gets pitiable and old.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ignorance is humorous, but at times it just gets pitiable and old.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ignorance is humorous, but at times it just gets pitiable and old.

auth_sentence.content: The fence turned out to be nothing much, a pitiable chain-link job.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fence turned out to be nothing much, a pitiable chain-link job.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fence turned out to be nothing much, a pitiable chain-link job.
